# **User Guide**{style="padding-top: 0px;"}

Our app allows user to understand and visualise the business performance, financial health, and employment health of the city of Engagement, Ohio. 

In our ShinyApp we will address below questions:

**1.	Over the period covered by the dataset, which businesses appear to be more prosperous? Which appear to be struggling?**

Trelliscope: Overview and comparison of all pubs and restaurants based on their visit and revenue

Time Series Plot & Cycle plot of visit: Provide details of number of visits for selected venue id

Time Series Plot & Cycle plot of revenue: Provide details of revenues for selected venue id

**2.	How does the financial health of the residents change over the period covered by the dataset? How do wages compare to the overall cost of living in Engagement? Are there groups that appear to exhibit similar patterns?**

Linechart of monthly balance: Provide the comparison of average monthly balance overtime across different groups

Interactive Scatter plot: Provide comparison of wage and cost of living acrooss different groups

Animated bubble plot: Provide overview of wage and cost trend overtime

Cycle plot of expenditure: Provide details of expenditure in categories


**3.	Describe the health of the various employers within the city limits. What employment patterns do you observe?**

Geographic Graph : Provide an overview of employer turnover rate distribution of the city of Engagement.

DT Table : Provide employer detail entry of selected specific Company Turnover Level.

Stacked Plot : Provide an over view of employer employment factor by Turnover Level.
